short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful and simple new Paper Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension provides you better, beautiful and simple new chrome tab with lots of rich features.

1) You can resize your shortcut icons
2) You can hide clock, search bar or shortcut icons
3) You can select solid background colors
4) You can enable or disable auto change wallpaper
5) You can play game with no internet connection required
6) You can choose different search engines in search bar
7) You can create your own notes

Update: More feature will be added soon...
